def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNApontamento
widget.View.Commands["CONFIRMAR"].Visible = CNApontamento.VerificaSeUsuarioEstaNaAlcada() widget.View.Commands["REPROVAR"].Visible = CNApontamento.VerificaSeUsuarioEstaNaAlcada()
